title: Market Baskets
content: Instantly invest in a basket of digital assets. Basket shares are always redeemable for their underlying assets.

title: LP Management
content: Quickly add or remove liquidity for all assets in an Exposure basket to earn real yield.

title: XPSR Token
content: Holders of XPSR manage Exposure baskets by voting for changes and new baskets. All ecosystem revenue goes to XPSR stakers.
